body: Okay so what the fuck is this professor she fucking broke hos mind and raped him and altered his memories wow just wow now i hate this professor and support the main character and this was the first time i acknowledged a fat guy in a hentai for once man even though he prevented her marriage they were still good together i guess but damn she cucked the cucker but damn she got fucking powers and shit and whos the guy at the end is he the same person or what but damn altering someones memory into a rape/breakup scene i think but idk since its japanese but damn i wish the professor didnt have powers and the fat guy just molested her and broke her that would be my ideal ending
